SFIN.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "SAFMAR Financial investments"
SFIN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂSAFMAR Financial InvestmentsÂ, an investment holding, operates in the financial sector. The company leases passenger cars, commercial vehicles, self-propelled machines, buses, and other assets. It also offers life and property, motor, health, and other insurance products; compulsory pension insurance services; corporate and individual pension plans; and POS lending brokerage services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
